title: Designing Strategies to Enhance Learner Engagement in Massive Open Online Courses (MOOCs)

context.prior_knowledge: Online learning experience and fundamental digital literacy
context.additional_context: PBL (Project-Based Learning) for strengthening language-related job competencies in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments, combining MOOC platforms with offline workshops for hybrid learning.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three or more quantitative metrics for measuring engagement in MOOC environments
Learners can derive five or more factors influencing learner engagement through case studies and text analysis
Learners can design MOOC improvement strategies using PBL (Project-Based Learning) and develop applicable prototypes (e.g., assignments/community structures)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
